import React,{Fragment,useState} from 'react' const initialState={ company:"", website:"", location:"", status:"", skills:"", githubusername:"", bio:"", twitter:"", facebook:"", linkedin:"", youtube:"", instagram:"" } const CreateProfile = () => { const [formData,setFormData]=useState(initialState); const { company, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube, instagram }=formData; const [displayLinks,setDisplayLinks]=useState(false); return (

Create Your Profile

Let's get some information to make your profile stand out

* = required field
Give us an idea of where you are at in your career
Could be your own company or one you work for
Could be your own or a company website
City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
Optional
{displayLinks &&
} Go Back
) } export default CreateProfile
